verses.verse: <S%H4310>"Oh<s%> <S%H5414><s%> that I <S%H3045>knew<s%> where I might <S%H4672>find<s%> Him, That I might <S%H935>come<s%> to His <S%H8499>seat!<s%>
"I would <S%H3045>learn<s%> the <S%H4405>words<s%> [which] He would <S%H6030>answer,<s%> And <S%H995>perceive<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> He would <S%H559>say<s%> to me.
"Would He <S%H7378>contend<s%> with me by the <S%H7230>greatness<s%> of [His] <S%H3581>power<s%>? <S%H3808>No,<s%> <S%H389>surely<s%> He would <S%H7760>pay<s%> <S%H7760>attention<s%> to me.
<S%H8033>"There<s%> the <S%H3477>upright<s%> would <S%H3198>reason<s%> with Him; And I would be <S%H6403>delivered<s%> <S%H5331>forever<s%> from my <S%H8199>Judge.<s%>
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6924>forward<s%> but He is not [there,] And <S%H268>backward,<s%> but I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H995>perceive<s%> Him;
When He <S%H6213>acts<s%> on the <S%H8040>left,<s%> I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H2372>behold<s%> [Him;] He <S%H9399>turns<s%> on the <S%H3225>right,<s%> I <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> Him.
"But He <S%H3045>knows<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> I <S%H5973>take;<s%> [When] He has <S%H974>tried<s%> me, I shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> as <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
"My <S%H7272>foot<s%> has <S%H270>held<s%> <S%H270>fast<s%> to His <S%H9036>path;<s%> I have <S%H8104>kept<s%> His <S%H1870>way<s%> and not <S%H5186>turned<s%> <S%H5186>aside.<s%>

"I have not <S%H4185>departed<s%> from the <S%H4687>command<s%> of His <S%H8193>lips;<s%> I have <S%H6845>treasured<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> my <S%H2706>necessary<s%> <S%H2706>food.<s%>
"But He is <S%H259>unique<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H7725>turn<s%> Him? And [what] His <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>desires,<s%> that He <S%H6213>does.<s%>
"For He <S%H9608>performs<s%> <S%H2706>what<s%> is <S%H2706>appointed<s%> for me, And <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1992>such<s%> [decrees] are with Him.
<S%H5921>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> I would be <S%H926>dismayed<s%> at His <S%H6440>presence;<s%> [When] I <S%H995>consider,<s%> I am <S%H6342>terrified<s%> of Him.
"[It is] <S%H410>God<s%> [who] has made my <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7401>faint,<s%> And the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> [who] has <S%H926>dismayed<s%> me,
But I am not <S%H6789>silenced<s%> by the <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> <S%H3808>Nor<s%> deep <S%H652>gloom<s%> [which] <S%H3680>covers<s%> [me.]
